languages.text: Строители выбрали пылающие миры как наиболее подходящее им место жизни. Однако они вымерли вскоре после бегства — возможно, не сумев приспособиться к жизни вне своей звездной родины. Впрочем, они оставили богатое наследие в виде уникальных технологий и жаропрочных материалов. И теперь это сокровище принадлежит династии фон Валанциус!

traits.locale_text: Строители выбрали пылающие миры как наиболее подходящее им место жизни. Однако они вымерли вскоре после бегства — возможно, не сумев приспособиться к жизни вне своей звездной родины. Они, однако, оставили богатое наследие в виде уникальных технологий и жаропрочных материалов. И теперь это сокровище принадлежит династии фон Валанциус!

languages.text: The Builders considered burning worlds as the most fit for habitation, yet they went extinct shortly after the exodus, perhaps unable to adapt to the harsh realities of life outside their stellar home. Their civilisation left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!
languages.original_text: Строители выбрали пылающие миры как наиболее подходящее им место жизни. Однако они вымерли вскоре после бегства — возможно, не сумев приспособиться к жизни вне своей звездной родины. Впрочем, они оставили богатое наследие в виде уникальных технологий и жаропрочных материалов. И теперь это сокровище принадлежит династии фон Валанциус!

traits.locale_text: The Builders chose burning worlds as the most fitting for habitation, yet they went extinct shortly after the exodus, perhaps unable to adapt to the harsh realities of life outside their stellar home. Their civilization left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!

Their civilization left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!

Their civilisation left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!

The Builders considered burning worlds as the most fit for habitation, yet they went extinct shortly after the exodus, perhaps unable to adapt to the harsh realities of life outside their stellar home. Their civilisation left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!

The Builders considered burning worlds as the most fit for habitation, yet they went extinct shortly after the exodus, perhaps unable to adapt to the harsh realities of life outside their stellar home. Their civilisation left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!

languages.text: 到了最后，筑火者来到了燃烧世界，认为这里是最适宜的新家园。然而，它们在大迁移之后不久就灭绝了，或许是由于它们无法适应恒星家园以外的严酷环境。它们的文明留下了大量独特的技术与耐热材料，如今，这些宝藏全部属于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！
languages.original_text: The Builders considered burning worlds as the most fit for habitation, yet they went extinct shortly after the exodus, perhaps unable to adapt to the harsh realities of life outside their stellar home. Their civilisation left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!

traits.locale_text: 到了最后，筑火者来到了燃烧群界，认为这里是最适宜的新家园。然而，它们在大迁移之后不久就灭绝了，或许是由于它们无法适应恒星家园以外的严酷环境。它们的文明留下了大量独特的技术与耐热材料，如今，这些宝藏全部属于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！

languages.text: ビルダーたちは、居住に最も適しているのはバーニングワールドだと考えていたが、星の外での過酷な現実に適応できなかったのか、移住後まもなく絶滅してしまった。彼らの文明は、独自の技術や耐熱素材などを豊富に残しており、現在、この宝はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のものとなっている！
languages.original_text: The Builders considered burning worlds as the most fit for habitation, yet they went extinct shortly after the exodus, perhaps unable to adapt to the harsh realities of life outside their stellar home. Their civilisation left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!

traits.locale_text: ビルダーたちは、居住に最も適しているのはバーニングワールドだと考えていたが、星の外での過酷な現実に適応できなかったのか、移住後まもなく絶滅してしまった。彼らの文明は、独自の技術や耐熱素材などを豊富に残しており、現在、この宝はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝のものとなっている！

languages.text: Los Constructores consideraban los mundos ardientes como los más aptos para ser habitados, pero se extinguieron poco después del éxodo, quizá incapaces de adaptarse a las duras condiciones de la vida fuera de su hogar estelar. Su civilización dejó una riqueza de tecnologías únicas y materiales resistentes al calor, ¡y ahora este tesoro pertenece a la dinastía von Valancius!
languages.original_text: The Builders considered burning worlds as the most fit for habitation, yet they went extinct shortly after the exodus, perhaps unable to adapt to the harsh realities of life outside their stellar home. Their civilisation left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!

traits.locale_text: Los Constructores consideraban los mundos {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardientes{/g} como los más aptos para ser habitados, pero se extinguieron poco después del éxodo, quizá incapaces de adaptarse a las duras condiciones de la vida fuera de su hogar estelar. Su civilización dejó una riqueza de tecnologías únicas y materiales resistentes al calor, ¡y ahora este tesoro pertenece a la dinastía von Valancius!

languages.text: Die Erbauer glaubten, dass brennende Welten sich am ehesten als Alternative einigten, doch bald nach dem Exodus starben sie aus. Vielleicht gelang es ihnen nicht, sich an die Gnadenlosigkeit des Lebens abseits ihres Heimatsterns anzupassen. Ihre Zivilisation hinterließ einen wahren Schatz an einzigartigen Technologien und hitzebeständigen Materialien, und dieser Schatz gehört nun der Dynastie derer von Valancius!
languages.original_text: The Builders considered burning worlds as the most fit for habitation, yet they went extinct shortly after the exodus, perhaps unable to adapt to the harsh realities of life outside their stellar home. Their civilisation left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!

traits.locale_text: Die Erbauer glaubten, dass brennende Welten sich am ehesten als Alternative einigten, doch bald nach dem Exodus starben sie aus. Vielleicht gelang es ihnen nicht, sich an die Gnadenlosigkeit des Lebens abseits ihres Heimatsterns anzupassen. Ihre Zivilisation hinterließ einen wahren Schatz an einzigartigen Technologien und hitzebeständigen Materialien, und dieser Schatz gehört nun der Dynastie derer von Valancius!

languages.text: Bien qu'ils aient par la suite élu domicile sur des mondes brûlants, ils se seraient éteints peu après leur exode, peut-être en raison de leur incapacité à s'adapter à la dure réalité de la vie en dehors de leur étoile natale. Quoi qu'il en soit, leur civilisation a laissé derrière elle une profusion de technologies et de matériaux thermorésistants uniques, un fabuleux trésor qui appartient désormais à la dynastie von Valancius !
languages.original_text: The Builders considered burning worlds as the most fit for habitation, yet they went extinct shortly after the exodus, perhaps unable to adapt to the harsh realities of life outside their stellar home. Their civilisation left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!

traits.locale_text: Bien qu'ils aient par la suite élu domicile sur des mondes brûlants, ils se seraient éteints peu après leur exode, peut-être en raison de leur incapacité à s'adapter à la dure réalité de la vie en dehors de leur étoile natale. Quoi qu'il en soit, leur civilisation a laissé derrière elle une profusion de technologies et de matériaux thermorésistants uniques, un fabuleux trésor qui appartient désormais à la dynastie von Valancius !

languages.text: Kurucular yerleşmeye en ideal yer olarak yanan dünyaları seçse de, göç ettikten kısa bir süre sonra soyları tükenmiş. Belki de vatanları olan güneşin ötesindeki yaşamın zorluğuna ayak uyduramamışlardır. Bu uygarlıktan geriye bol miktarda eşsiz teknoloji ve ısıya dayanıklı materyal kalmış ve bu hazine artık von Valancius hanedanlığına ait!
languages.original_text: The Builders considered burning worlds as the most fit for habitation, yet they went extinct shortly after the exodus, perhaps unable to adapt to the harsh realities of life outside their stellar home. Their civilisation left a wealth of unique technologies and heat-resistant materials, and now this treasure belongs to the von Valancius dynasty!
